title: The 1%
oneLiner: There’s class warfare, all right, but it’s my class, the rich class, that’s making war, and we’re winning ― Warren Buffett

section.subtitle: Concept
section.text:
The 1% is a physical representation of the concept of class warfare mentioned by Warren Buffett. The piece aims to shine light how this fight would feel from the perspective of the 99%. Almost in reach but event if the nails could hit it, the impact would do no damage.

1 diamond vs 99 nails

section.subtitle: Technical Implementation
section.text:
The installation consists of a single dc motor that gives the nails the short opportunity for a 1 on 1 with the diamond.

1 diamond vs 99 nails

section.subtitle: Future Development
section.text: Find a better way to support the diamond, switch the 3D printed PVC chain to metal and finaly update the nail 'plug', that create the tension to the string, to metal.
